input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
Barbie Fashion Night Looks - Pink and Black Cheetah by Mattel

Product features:
Each includes 2 fashions and trend-topping accessories
On-trend accessories include 2 amazing pairs of shoes (in different colors), statement pieces, and a handbag
Mix and match with other friends, fashions, and accessories (sold separately)
Dolls not included.
input_text.Response A:
Please write a fun product description
Fashionable and fierce, this Barbie Fashion Night Looks - Pink and Black Cheetah by Mattel is the perfect addition to your Barbie collection. With two stylish and trend-setting outfits, you can mix and match accessories for endless fun. The pink and black cheetah print dress is sure to turn heads while the black jumpsuit with pink detailing is perfect for a night out. Each set includes shoes, a statement piece, and a handbag. Mix and match with other friends and accessories (sold separately) for even more fun! Product does not include dolls.
input_text.Response B: Get ready for a fierce and fabulous night out with the Barbie Fashion Night Looks - Pink and Black Cheetah by Mattel! This stunning set includes two trendy outfits and a range of accessories that are sure to turn heads. The first outfit is a pink and black cheetah print dress with a stylish sequin belt and matching heels. The second outfit is a sleek black jumpsuit with a plunging neckline and a pair of strappy heels. To complete the look, the set also includes an on-trend handbag and statement pieces that will make any doll stand out from the crowd. Mix and match with other fashionable friends and accessories (sold separately) for endless styling opportunities. Whether you're heading to a glamorous party or a chic soirée, the Barbie Fashion Night Looks - Pink and Black Cheetah by Mattel is the perfect choice for any fashion-forward doll.

label_annotations.feedback: B was much more descriptive and made me want to buy the item. Also A appears to have had a slight glitch at the beginning with saying " Please write a fun product description"
